author: Steve Whittaker and Loren G. Terveen and Bonnie A. Nardi
title: Let's stop pushing the envelope and start addressing it: a reference task agenda for HCI
venue: a Senior Research Scientist in the Human Computer Interaction Department of AT&T LabsResearch
window: (Marcus, 1992, Price, 1991, Stern, 1990, Wayne, 1989). A dataset consists of a corpus of spoken sentences defined and made available to the researchers in advance of the bakeoff. The data contains both Reference task agenda . . . 16 "training data" -- sentences
